programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch

programme.desc: Severide n'hésite pas à mettre son poste en jeu pour aider l'un des siens; Kidd aide Natalie à gérer la relation compliquée qu'elle entretient avec sa soeur; Violet avoue enfin ses sentiments; Herrmann se prépare à passer l'examen pour devenir chef.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Goodwin est contrainte de suivre les ordres et de procéder à de douloureuses mises à pied; la fille de Charles est hospitalisée à la suite d'un grave accident de voiture; un patient en attente d'une greffe prend une décision qui va changer sa vie.

programme.title: Cinéma
programme.desc: Un ancien tueur à gages retrouve ses instincts meurtriers après le vol de sa Ford Mustang et le meurtre du chien que lui avait offert sa femme. Il se lance alors à la poursuite du responsable.

programme.title: Croisière vers la mort
programme.desc: Une spécialiste des médias sociaux fait une croisière qui, selon elle, augmentera la popularité de son profil public, mais lorsqu'elle est retrouvée brutalement assassinée dans une cabine de la classe économique, les questions surgissent.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: Danny Messer déclenche le système d'alarme du train après avoir aperçu un corps sur la voie.

programme.title: La faille
programme.desc: Les soupçons pèsent contre Prévost, trouvé dans le coma après avoir tenté de se suicider.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Un cheval de course favori est retrouvé mort dans son box; Hart soupçonne un acte criminel; l'enquête de Murdoch et Brackenreid vise les autres propriétaires de chevaux et les entraîneurs; un suspect émerge, mais il est retrouvé assassiné.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Un séjour dans les bois prend une tournure terrifiante pour Ogden, Hart, Effie et Louise; un groupe de jeunes filles poursuivies par un tueur fou demande leur aide; à Toronto, Murdoch et Watts enquêtent sur le meurtre d'un condamné récemment libéré.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Murdoch, Brackenreid, Crabtree, Watts et Higgins participent à la parade de Noël; avant le début des festivités, un corps émerge du sac de cadeaux du père Noël; dans la bouche de la victime se trouvent des billets avec le mot VILAIN.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Murdoch enquête sur l'assassinat du propriétaire d'une entreprise de construction; entre-temps, Effie, une jambe cassée, se met à épier ses voisins; elle s'imagine le pire lorsque les McDowell enterrent quelque chose dans leur cour en pleine nuit.

programme.title: Le goût du crime
programme.desc: Le petit ami d'une pianiste émergente et vedette de TikTok a connu une fin prématurée; Madison et Alexa enquêtent de concert sur cette affaire afin de découvrir si une vieille connaissance au passé trouble de la victime est réellement le tueur.

programme.title: HPI: haut potentiel intellectuel
programme.desc: Enceinte, Morgane est en plein tourment et se demande qui est le père de son bébé; persuadée qu'il s'agit de Karadec, elle compte profiter de l'enquête sur le meurtre d'Alexandra Collet, mère au foyer, pour lui annoncer la nouvelle.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: Une flèche tue une mannequin et blesse un milliardaire à une fête.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Pendant que Stephen Rowe est reconnu non coupable du meurtre de sa femme, le corps de la victime est repêché, les doigts coupés, mais les détectives découvrent des indices prouvant que Stephen est bien le tueur.

programme.title: Chicago Fire: caserne 51

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Murdoch et Brackenreid se rendent aux Jeux des Highlands; leur participation aux épreuves de force devra toutefois attendre puisqu'un meurtre vient d'être commis; au bord d'une rivière, Ogden et Margaret découvrent un cadavre dans les roseaux.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc: Un corps est retrouvé dans une ruelle avec la carte de tarot de la mort; Murdoch est convaincu qu'il y a un lien entre la foire de voyance qui bat son plein et le révérend Kitteridge qui, furieux, dénonce ces supposés adorateurs du diable.

programme.title: HPI: haut potentiel intellectuel
programme.desc: Le propriétaire d'une bijouterie est retrouvé mort à la suite d'une attaque; sur la scène de crime, Morgane reconnaît des bijoux que son père a volés; elle devra résoudre l'enquête tout en dissimulant son implication indirecte dans le meurtre.

programme.title: HPI: haut potentiel intellectuel
programme.desc: Enceinte, Morgane est en plein tourment et se demande qui est le père de son bébé; persuadée qu'il s'agit de Karadec, elle compte profiter de l'enquête sur le meurtre d'Alexandra Collet, mère au foyer, pour lui annoncer la nouvelle.

programme.title: HPI: haut potentiel intellectuel

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: Cinéma

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Après que Daryl a tué le rôdeur, Daryl et Quinn, enchaînés ensemble, tuent plusieurs rôdeurs améliorés dans l'arène avant que Fallou ne tue le guerrier Genet qui a reçu l'ordre de leur tirer dessus.

programme.title: La justicière
programme.desc: Un professeur d'histoire obsédé par la recherche d'un trésor est assassiné. McCall et son équipe se lancent sur les traces du meurtrier... et du trésor enfoui ! Par ailleurs, Dante hésite à présenter ses fils à McCall, qui les a invités à souper.

programme.desc: Thony et Jorge collaborent pour protéger leurs familles, mais des tensions surgissent; à l'hôpital, l'intégrité de Thony est mise à l'épreuve; pendant ce temps, une menace pour la sécurité de Ramona oblige cette dernière et Jorge à agir rapidement.

programme.title: Croisière vers la mort
programme.desc: Une rédactrice de mode entreprend une croisière entre Londres et New York; malheureusement, elle ne se rendra jamais à destination; on se demande qui l'a tuée et si quelqu'un à bord sait ce qui s'est passé.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie realizes he's broke when his credit card is declined at the grocery store. Richard Lewis guest stars.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Against Alan's judgment, Charlie falls for a seemingly crazy woman named Frankie. Guest star: Jenna Elfman.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Frankie tells Charlie and Alan why she and her daughter are on the run; Frankie's daughter has a crush on Jake.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan offends Charlie by choosing harebrained cousins as Jake's guardians in the event of his death.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: An undercover officer (Arnold Schwarzenegger) teaches a rowdy class of peewees, to identify one whose mother must be found.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An apparent attack on a pregnant woman who then miscarried is part of a blackmail scheme against her boss.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A child's corpse reopens a 31-year-old missing-persons case and forces a woman to delve into painful memories.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: While investigating a college student's rape accusation, Cerreta and Logan find evidence indicating she might be trying to hide her own sexual promiscuity.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An ex-football star's murder over gambling debts is in doubt because of a double-indemnity policy on him.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A catastrophic fire at a dance club leads to the prosecution of an immigrations officer who supplied bogus papers to aliens.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The corpse of a sleazy producer found in a meat locker leads to an investigation of his co-producer.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A celebrity's obsessive fan claims insanity as a defense tactic, so Stone sets out to prove the stalker is mentally competent.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: The boys battle fascists.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: The cavalry hires the boys to capture outlaws.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: The boys recover a widow's oil-rich land from swindlers.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a mini-golf superstar; Brennan worries her father is returning to a life of crime; Wendell asks Hodgins to help restore his girlfriend's family heirloom.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth and Brennan go undercover into the world of underground poker to investigate the death of a high-stakes gambler -- putting Booth at risk of relapsing; Hodgins creates a new lab-related product; Booth and Brennan receive exciting news.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: February 2nd keeps repeating for a cynical TV weatherman (Bill Murray) sent to watch the groundhog in Punxsutawney, Pa.

programme.title: Weekend at Bernie's
programme.desc: After they uncover evidence of fraud within their company, two novice insurance accountants try to hide the fact that their boss has been murdered when they are summoned to his home for the weekend.

programme.title: Major League II
programme.desc: Cleveland's new coach (Tom Berenger) whips his lackluster baseball players (Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) into winning shape.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stone may need an 11-year-old girl to testify against her father, who has been charged with murdering his wife.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A teen who claimed his shooting of a friend was accidental was involved in a similar incident years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A murder suspect faces the death penalty if the victim's parents can get him extradited to Connecticut.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A rehabilitation center staffed by Catholic nuns faces closure after an investigation into allegations of sexual molestation leads to rape charges.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stone brings charges against an apartment building's landlord and superintendent after a baby freezes to death.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Le 31 octobre 1996, peu après son décollage de l'aéroport de Congonhas à Sao Paulo, le vol 402 de la compagnie TAM s'écrase sur un quartier résidentiel et prend feu. Cet accident tue les 95 personnes qui se trouvent à bord.

programme.title: Au royaume des reptiles

programme.desc: Quand un équipement clé cesse de fonctionner, Fred se demande s'il ne serait pas temps de raccrocher; l'équipe de Parker lutte pour maintenir son rythme soutenu, quand un convoyeur tombe en panne.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: En route vers Dallas au départ d'Orlando, un Learjet privé transportant la légende du golf Payne Stewart montre un comportement délinquant; les contrôleurs aériens sont incapables de joindre l'équipage.

programme.title: Fermont

programme.title: Catastrophes naturelles: survivre au pire

programme.title: Mayday

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Une trop grosse charge met à l'épreuve Jamie et sa remorqueuse reconstruite HR-126; un transporteur de gravier frappe une paroi rocheuse, laissant un fouillis pour Kelly et John; l'assistant Gord Lundin a une chance d'exploiter sa propre dépanneuse.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute
programme.desc: Jamie et sa flotte de remorqueuses sont coincés dans leur propre cour par une chute de neige importante; un remorquage dans une profonde neige poudreuse provoque de gros ennuis pour Colin; Al et Gord sauvent un semi-remorque d'une position fragile.

programme.title: Cauchemar sur l'autoroute

programme.desc: Jamie conduit le Python hors de la route pour la première fois tandis que son frère Kelly affronte des vents violents et un poteau électrique pour sauver un semi-remorque chargé de tuyaux.

programme.title: Un souper presque parfait

programme.title: Un souper presque parfait

programme.title: Le grand chantier RONA
programme.desc: Après leur journée de travail, les candidats participent à une activité de voisinage; la mise en danger provoque des réactions inattendues.

programme.title: Un souper presque parfait
programme.desc: Céline-France prépare des recettes haïtiennes tout en nous parlant de sa mère et de son mari; les silences sont nombreux, mais finissent par se combler avec des discussions sur les origines françaises de Vianney, la rencontre d'Antoine avec sa femme.

programme.title: Trois fois plus
programme.desc: La famille Noël se remémore des vacances passées alors que la famille Mckay parle des vacances récentes; c'est un dur retour à la routine pour Virginie qui travaille dans le nord alors que ses filles vont à la garderie à Laval.

programme.title: De taudis à logis
programme.desc: À l'insu de Chauncey, Derek achète une maison située dans un quartier historique, ce qui complique les rénovations.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover? USA
programme.desc: Hailey et Kevin ont acheté leur maison à l'époque où ils n'avaient qu'une fille; aujourd'hui, avec trois enfants, l'espace est insuffisant.

programme.title: Karine et la maison jaune
programme.desc: Dépassée par le rythme des travaux, Karine appelle Richard et Maxime à la rescousse; on découvre son côté spirituel, on s'arrête chez l'antiquaire du coin et on choisit des pierres dans un cimetière pas comme les autres.

programme.title: Injections et bistouris
programme.desc: Dr Moubayed pratique une chirurgie complexe sur le nez et le menton de Kathie, une femme pourtant mannequin à ses heures.

programme.title: Dre Boutons
programme.desc: Corey a été étiqueté comme adorateur du diable à cause de son excroissance frontale; Keke est couverte de bosses.

programme.title: Deux amies: 1000 livres
programme.desc: Fit Farm est difficile. Ashely se dépasse. Vannessa réalise qu'elle peut plus qu'elle ne l'imaginait. Meghan doute du mariage. Tina explose.

programme.title: Dre Boutons: nouvelle ère
programme.desc: David craint que sa bosse soit cancéreuse; Carla a une enflure étrange sur la cuisse; James veut retirer ses 70 acrochordons.

programme.title: Cinéma

programme.title: De taudis à logis
programme.desc: Duke est de retour, prêt à rénover d'autres maisons avec vos experts, Keith et Alynne.

programme.title: Karine et la maison jaune
programme.desc: Karine reçoit sa porte d'entrée et ses armoires de cuisine, tandis que la céramique rose de la salle de bain lui cause quelques soucis; elle s'inquiète aussi de la taille de son divan conçu sur mesure, qui semble trop gros pour le salon.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover? USA
programme.desc: Maintenant que leurs garçons sont plus âgés, Mona et Dong sont prêts à transformer leur maison vieillissante en un endroit de rêve.

programme.title: Luxe au bord du lac
programme.desc: Alain et Sara, agriculteurs écoresponsables, cherchent une maison au bord d'un lac adaptée à leur mode de vie écologique.

programme.title: Vendre ou rénover au Québec
programme.desc: Véronique et Marc-Alexandre ont d'abord deux enfants dans une maison qui devient rapidement trop petite. En 2014, ils achètent un bungalow plus spacieux à Sainte-Catherine.

programme.title: Joyeux désordre
programme.desc: Une cliente attachée émotionnellement à ses objets apprend à garder l'essentiel sans perdre ses souvenirs.

programme.title: Hollywood rénove avec les frères Scott
programme.desc: Mira sollicite les frères Scott pour rénover la maison d'une amie proche après des problèmes de plomberie.

programme.title: SOS dermato
programme.desc: Leanne craint de subir une opération chirurgicale malgré son désir de se débarrasser d'un énorme lipome qui se trouve dans son dos.

programme.title: Chirurgie de l'extrême
programme.desc: Tamika a trouvé un partenaire avec lequel elle est heureuse, mais elle se sent mal à l'aise à cause de son surplus de peau.

programme.title: Chirurgie de l'extrême
programme.desc: Maranda a perdu le poids qu'elle avait pris en raison d'un crime horrible, mais sa peau lui rappelle son traumatisme.

programme.title: Chirurgie de l'extrême
programme.desc: Rafael a perdu plus de 500 livres, mais son excédent de peau est aujourd'hui un obstacle majeur dans sa vie.

programme.title: Combien tu m'aimes?
programme.desc: Les connectés tentent de découvrir qui leur a donné une moins bonne note la veille; le défi fait vivre toutes sortes d'émotions aux couples; alors que certains jouent le tout pour le tout, d'autres ne sont pas capable de compléter le défi.

programme.title: Le grand chantier RONA
programme.desc: Les équipes se dépêchent de terminer les travaux avant la remise du troisième marteau d'or et l'annonce de l'élimination de la semaine.

programme.title: Oscar Peterson: Black + White
programme.desc: A celebration of the life and career of Oscar Peterson, one of Canada's greatest jazz musicians and a master pianist.

programme.title: Christmas Icetastrophe
programme.desc: An asteroid strike in a small town unleashes ice crystals, threatening to freeze anything in its path.

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: A monstrous storm devastates Los Angeles, leaving the streets flooded and infested with sharks.

programme.title: Sharknado 2: The Second One
programme.desc: A freak weather system turns its deadly fury on New York City, unleashing a Sharknado on the population and its most cherished, iconic sites - and only Fin and April can save the Big Apple.

programme.title: Sharknado 3: Oh Hell No!
programme.desc: When Sharknadoes threaten the East Coast, chainsawwielding hero Fin must risk his life to save his children on spring break.

programme.title: Sharknado: The 4th Awakens
programme.desc: Five years after the wave of sharknados that wracked the east coast, the heroes are living a quiet life in the middle of the country. But there is no escaping...

programme.title: Sharknado 5: Global Swarming
programme.desc: Fin and his wife April travel around the world to save their young son who's trapped inside a Sharknado.

programme.title: No Time to Die
programme.desc: Recruited to rescue a kidnapped scientist, globe-trotting spy James Bond finds himself hot on the trail of a mysterious villain who's armed with a dangerous new technology.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
programme.desc: Optimus Prime and the Autobots take on their biggest challenge yet. When a new threat capable of destroying the entire planet emerges, they must team up with a powerful faction of Transformers known as the Maximals to save Earth.

programme.title: Lovely
programme.desc: An up-and-coming boxer from the projects begins questioning his dream after unforeseen circumstances alter his life.

programme.title: Rye Lane
programme.desc: Two youngsters reeling from bad breakups connect over an eventful day in South London.

programme.title: A Big Bold Beautiful Journey
programme.desc: Through a surprising twist of fate, single strangers Sarah and David get to relive important moments from their respective pasts, illuminating how they got to where they are in the present.

programme.title: Doomsday Prophecy
programme.desc: Officials race against time to counteract geological disturbances that threaten the planet.

programme.title: One Bad Apple: A Hannah Swensen Mystery
programme.desc: Hannah meets a new side of law and order as she investigates a murder.

programme.title: Storm Seekers
programme.desc: Scientists study the effects of global warming on hurricane frequency and strength.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: Under the Christmas Tree
programme.desc: Romantic sparks fly between Alma and Charlie when Charlie finds the perfect tree for the Maine governor's holiday celebration right in Alma's backyard.

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck hound finds himself in a town full of cats who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villain's evil plot. With help from a reluctant trainer, the underdog must assume the role of fearsome samurai and save the day.

programme.title: The Wish Swap
programme.desc: When Casey and Henry find themselves celebrating their birthdays at the same restaurant, they make birthday wishes at the same time which are granted. However they end up getting each other's wishes.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helm's daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: A Haunting in Venice
programme.desc: Now retired and living in self-imposed exile in the world's most glamorous city, Poirot reluctantly attends a seance at a decaying, haunted palazzo. He soon gets thrust into a sinister world of shadows and secrets when one of the guests is murdered.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: The Pitt
programme.desc: As patients continue to pour in, including a local prison inmate, Robby and Langdon must work together to save a beloved patient.

programme.title: Slotherhouse
programme.desc: Senior Emily Young wants to be elected sorority president. She adopts a cute sloth, thinking it will help her win, but a string of fatalities implicates the sloth.

programme.title: The Ugly Stepsister
programme.desc: Determined to outshine her beautiful stepsister, Elvira resorts to extreme measures to win the prince's heart.

programme.title: Someone Lives Here
programme.desc: Carpenter Khaleel Seivwright builds life-saving shelters for homeless people in Toronto.

programme.title: Jane Austen Wrecked My Life
programme.desc: Desperately single and plagued by writer's block, Agathe gets invited to the Jane Austen Writers' Residency in England. Caught in an unexpected romantic triangle, she must let go of her insecurities to decide what she really wants for herself.

programme.title: Storm Cell
programme.desc: A storm chaser battles personal demons while trying to save unsuspecting people from deadly weather.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Brent discovers his parents put money aside for him, but Oscar's forgotten where it is; Karen and Davis are hurt to learn how often people lie to the police and enlist Wanda as their lie detector.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: Karen, Wanda, and Lacey struggle to get noticed on a dating app; Oscar, Emma, and Hank try to figure out who purchased the abandoned lot in town.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash does his best to celebrate Eid with his sister Amira, but she wishes they could continue the traditions they had back home; Theo treats a teenage patient who wants to avoid telling his parents why he's in the hospital.

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: Scientists turn to a demolition expert for help after learning the instability of the moon threatens all life on Earth.

programme.title: Fast Friends
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Yolanda and Ariana, couple Halani and Riordan and brothers Sam and Matt face off in all-new challenges; a guest tests

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond ties a mad tycoon and his statuesque aide to a plot to flood Silicon Valley.

programme.title: You Only Live Twice

programme.title: Sharknado 3: Oh Hell No!
programme.desc: When Sharknadoes threaten the East Coast, chainsawwielding hero Fin must risk his life to save his children on spring break.

programme.title: Sharknado 5: Global Swarming
programme.desc: Fin and his wife April travel around the world to save their young son who's trapped inside a Sharknado.

programme.title: No Time to Die

programme.title: The Garfield Movie

programme.title: Rye Lane

programme.desc: In 1981, the 49ers complete their miracle Super Bowl run, galvanizing the troubled, iconoclastic city of San Francisco; as the 80s wear on, they celebrate another Super Bowl, welcome new superstar players, and weather drama off the field.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: To celebrate Wheeler Dealers' 20th anniversary, Mike and Elvis mark another motoring milestone: the end of production for the Ford Fiesta; the boys take on the restoration of a Mark 1; they're soon worried they've bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: A ride in a Peugeot 205 T16 inspires Mike's latest mission to buy a 205 Rallye; it's the UK version and is under-powered compared to European models, but Mike reckons Elvis can easily upgrade the engine to beat its Eurospec counterpart.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: It's 10 years since Saab last made a car, and Mike finds a soft-top 900 going cheap, but it isn't running smoothly, the clutch is iffy, the turbo lags and the steering is woolly.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are massive fans of turbo-charged Subarus and they're both baffled the company never produced a Scooby BRZ STI; the pair are going to make one themselves, using the newest car Mike bought on Wheeler Dealers.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike seeks to purchase a Land Rover Discovery.

programme.title: Vegas Rat Rods
programme.desc: With the delivery date for the ultimate Vintage Dirt Bike Hauler imminent, Steve pushes his crew to complete his vision; Welder Up's reputation for building the meanest and fastest rat rods is challenged.

programme.title: Last Chance Garage
programme.desc: Tony travels to Nashville, Tennessee, to find out why a 2021 Jeep 6x6 is not running the way it was built; while there, he finds a '67 Mustang in need of engine work to reclaim its dominance on the road.

programme.title: Last Chance Garage
programme.desc: A 1969 Chevy Nova comes into the shop hoping to have a second life as a street-legal car; also, a 1933 Ford Cabriolet that's been sitting in a chicken coop for the last 60 years makes a comeback.

programme.title: Last Chance Garage
programme.desc: A botched 2020 Jeep comes in with an engine from 20 years prior; Tony and his team try make this modern Jeep run with classic parts; a British sportscar that hasn't been driven in years comes into the shop looking to regain its royal status.

programme.title: Last Chance Garage
programme.desc: Tony takes on the challenge of a botched International Scout nightmare with wiring issues; another client's Camaro, stored but damaged by a falling tree, needs some urgent attention.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: This two-door Jeep JL is the best deal out there for open-air cruising; we toss the hard top for an easy-to-use soft top and add some additional versatility to the doors, while also giving it a few more creature comforts for everyday use.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: On this Comanche, we do some metalwork to the fenders, showing how you can run a larger tire; check out a throwback to the previous Comanches and see where they are now.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: If it has wheels and goes off road, Ian Johnson will work on it; taking you along for the do-it-yourself ride, as we tackle everything from simple bolt-ons to full-on fabrication.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: How do you prep your offroad vehicles for their next trip? That's what Ian is going to show you today. He's getting his LJ buggy, which has been on the trails for almost seven years, ready for an end-of-your-off-road adventure.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: Mark and Aaron show off two related and rare builds; digging into the Graveyard Carz archives, for the first time ever, they squeeze two complete car builds into one episode, a 1967 Hemi GTX convertible and a 1969 Hemi Road Runner convertible.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: Mark and the Ghoulz embark on a tribute 1971 Challenger, modifying a 1973 Challenger to produce the much more desirable 1971 model year; the client wants more muscle under the hood and a new transmission, an epic build!

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: The season finale shows the completion of a once boring '73 Challenger that's been transformed into a breathtaking, powerhouse, tribute '71 Challenger; the car is topped off with a crate Hemi and a host of aftermarket improvements.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: The first of the Three Amigos builds is coming to a close -- a 1970 tribute Barracuda with a 392 crate Hemi! Mark and the team rush to complete the dash, the 392 Hemi, the A/C and the interior for the Barracuda's first road test in over 7 years.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz

programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich troubleshoot transmission issues and more in the 1969 Chevy Impala that's powered by a supercharged 498ci big-block V8, then take it back to the track to see if they can finally get their 10-second time slip.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A 1956 Ford truck has been sitting in a barn for more than 30 years; Joe and his crew fab up a hand-built custom frame, drop in a big power plant and make the interior smell like new leather.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: The crew welds, grinds and hammers the frame and chassis of the barn-find '56 Ford truck; Joe uses all his tricks to make it look like it has been parked in a field for more than 50 years, but drive like a modern muscle machine.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: The crew sinks their teeth into a legendary '77 Bandit Trans Am; a car of this stature calls for a big motor, meaty tires, low stance, steel spoilers, killer paint job and a brand-new interior; a '67 Chevelle returns for a supercharger engine.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe is deep into the rebuild of a '77 Bandit Trans Am; the car has a new frame, updated suspension and a new LS motor, but the T-Top is totally janky; it needs strengthening before this classic muscle car can get roaring down the road again.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: The crew checks another car off their bucket list when they transform a '70 Chevelle into a drag car; they make it mean with a monster motor, big tires, trick frame and a roll cage; but Joe dreams up a chopped roof at the 11th hour.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: It's open-car surgery as Joe and the team work to realize his dream of a cold-blooded '70 Chevelle race car with a chopped roof; complications with the modified roof arise when the big-block monster motor obstructs driver visibility.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe stumbles across a '64 Ford Galaxie in great shape with only 60,000 miles on it; for Joe, it isn't enough to restore it to 1964, which means a trick frame with all-new steering, tires and a Coyote engine that will really make the car blast off.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Three years after a unicorn first rolled into the shop, Joe is more determined than ever to honor a 1936 Hudson owner's dying wishes to bring the car back to life; the ultimate Iron Resurrection will put Joe's exceptional metal skills to the test.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: For a former professional wrestler, there isn't a better 50th birthday present than restoring a cult-classic 1965 Ford Falcon.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A former customer returns to the shop with a new project, a 1950 5-window Chevy truck; this isn't just any car in his collection, it's the crown jewel; to Joe's horror, this prized possession might have some seriously unsalvageable damage.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Three years after a unicorn first rolled into the shop, Joe is more determined than ever to honor a 1936 Hudson owner's dying wishes to bring the car back to life; the ultimate Iron Resurrection will put Joe's exceptional metal skills to the test.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: For a former professional wrestler, there isn't a better 50th birthday present than restoring a cult-classic 1965 Ford Falcon.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A former customer returns to the shop with a new project, a 1950 5-window Chevy truck; this isn't just any car in his collection, it's the crown jewel; to Joe's horror, this prized possession might have some seriously unsalvageable damage.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe stumbles across a '64 Ford Galaxie in great shape with only 60,000 miles on it; for Joe, it isn't enough to restore it to 1964, which means a trick frame with all-new steering, tires and a Coyote engine that will really make the car blast off.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: The crew checks another car off their bucket list when they transform a '70 Chevelle into a drag car; they make it mean with a monster motor, big tires, trick frame and a roll cage; but Joe dreams up a chopped roof at the 11th hour.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: It's open-car surgery as Joe and the team work to realize his dream of a cold-blooded '70 Chevelle race car with a chopped roof; complications with the modified roof arise when the big-block monster motor obstructs driver visibility.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: MLB pitcher Jacob deGrom asks the crew to revamp his OBS Ford; the diesel guys convert a rare British Land Rover Defender from right-hand drive to left-hand drive for a client.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Heavy D and the crew transform a rundown Canadian logging truck into a maxed out, custom semi with which to transport their builds; Diesel Dave and the Muscle go head-to-head building two ultimate Diesel Daily Drivers for their next truck giveaway.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Dulcich enlists Wiley Stevens and Chris Birdsong to transplant a third-generation Hemi into the 1974 Dodge D100, also known as the Mopar Muscle Truck; after issues hold up progress, the guys clean up a new project 1974 Dodge Charger.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: If it has wheels and goes off road, Ian Johnson will work on it; taking you along for the do-it-yourself ride, as we tackle everything from simple bolt-ons to full-on fabrication.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: How do you prep your offroad vehicles for their next trip? That's what Ian is going to show you today. He's getting his LJ buggy, which has been on the trails for almost seven years, ready for an end-of-your-off-road adventure.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: If it has wheels and goes off road, Ian Johnson will work on it! He takes you along for the do it yourself ride, as we tackle everything from simple bolt-ons to full-on fabrication.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: A sunbaked Jeep JK tub is reborn as a no-holds-barred, Southern-style throwdown buggy; Ian begins with a custom chassis to cradle massive axles, long-tube suspension and towering 40-inch tires; all backed by big horsepower.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian builds out monster axles to handle the kind of abuse only 40-inch tires can dish out; sparks fly as he cuts and clears the inner fender wells, making room for all that rubber and travel.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian transforms a Factory Five Racing XTF test mule into a hardcore support rig for the Build for Off Road Adventure Ride; he starts by breathing life into the engine and then it's all about strength and control.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: When Andy decides to take another crack at the world speed record for tow trucks in his Racing Wrecker, Bobby plans to take him on in a 1979 Zephyr with a hot new engine; neither expects a third racer to show up with a sleeper that wakes everyone up.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy puts the boys to work on a crazy-looking vintage race car, a Hot Wheels Ramblin' Wrecker tow truck racer, and a 1970 Chevrolet Camaro rescued from Hurricane Sandy.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Rocker Ted Nugent brings in his beloved '74 Bronco; Bill and the guys make an all-terrain beast unlike any other; With his creative sparks flying, Bill gets going on a build he's dreamed about for years: a handmade, all-tube, off-road buggy.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: A local client wants the teams help to surprise his dad with a custom 1946 Ford Coupe; Bill goes for a mix of both classy and supercharged when working on his wife's 2021 Escalade.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Ekstensive needs a new shop truck, Bill and the guys go sky-high with a lifted '21 F-450 King Ranch capable of hauling over 20,000 pounds; with most of the '46 Ford Coupe body beyond repair, the team has no choice but to build from the ground up.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: The guys hit the home stretch on the '46 Ford Blue Thunder, its once-rusted shell now rebuilt into a one-of-one showstopper; Bill is surprised when John Cena drops off a '69 MGC.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill and the gang split a nearly perfect 1960 Willys Jeep into four pieces to make it longer, wider and meaner.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: After John Cena makes a surprise appearance at the shop, Bill and the guys begin to customize John's small 1969 MGC to be a perfect fit; a new customer wants a handmade lifted suspension on his 1920 Denali 2500 as a gift for his wife.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill is still being put to the test with a 1928 Ford Rat Rod, a 1942 Ford pickup and a 1975 C10.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill has never really liked the body of the 1974 Cadillac Eldorado, but when a client wants hers radically redesigned, Ekstensive blends old and new to make it cooler than the rest.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill and the team work their magic to customize a brand-new 2022 International wrecker; now that the pristine 1960s Willys Jeep has been quartered, they use imaginative fabrication techniques to make it whole again.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: An Ekstensive favorite, a 2001 Hummer H1, needs some serious reinforcements; Bill changes things up on his completely custom, all-tube buggy by borrowing technology from monster trucks; Bill puts his daughter to work customizing her 2020 Challenger.
