programme.title: Agent Binky: Pets of the Universe
programme.desc: When the humans head outside at night for unknown reasons, the pets call in back-up to help them battle a swarm of fireflies; it's Sisi's first sleepover and she's too excited and when bedtime comes, she can't calm down.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Motor won't take a bath before their family photo; it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go
programme.desc: When Thomas accidentally breaks a light he's hauling to the Sodor Festival of Lights, he learns to be honest after making a mistake; Thomas needs repainting and must be patient as he dries, even though he feels like he's missing out.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Rudy is afraid of getting a shot at the doctor's office, so Nina and Abby play pretend to show what the visit will be like so he can feel less scared.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Daddy Pig's office and meet his colleagues; Mr. Rabbit works with numbers; Mrs. Cat seems to spend her time drawing shapes on a computer.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig take Peppa, George and all their friends on a boat trip to Pirate Island. On the island, Grandpa shows everyone how to use his metal detector to find treasure and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George takes off his rain hat and catches a cold.

programme.title: Max & Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby and Valerie tidy up the park; Ruby, Louise, and Valerie host a bake sale, while Max flies his dragon kite.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble & Crew are on the chase.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires the Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg; Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby and Pandy find a magical jar of googly eyes, they're in for a trouble-making surprise; luckily, MerCat knows just how to burst trouble's bubble.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: When the Mouse Family is exhausted by baby's crying, Vida discovers that she's teething; Vida soothes Tidbit's sunburn when fun in the sun distracts him from reapplying sunscreen.

programme.title: Barney's World
programme.desc: During a picnic in the park, Mel does not take into account the environment around her; Barney transforms children into butterflies who can talk to plants and animals; Mel learns that it is important to respect and care for nature.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Tsehay hears a pretty tune and it's from Simon, practicing his bird calls; they make animal noises to try and call a bird over and come along with Buddy on a nice nature walk.

programme.title: Max & Ruby
programme.desc: The adventures of two bunny siblings.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the school fête where the top prize in the raffle is a trip in a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It's George's birthday and mummy and daddy Pig have a special day planned.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa, and has made up a pretend friend called `Leo Lion'. Peppa can't see Leo, but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and playing dressing up.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Farmer Al's truck and Bettina the cow get stuck on top of a broken bridge, the pups must lower them to safety and find out what's wrong with Bettina.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it -- and her beehive -- go missing from her farm.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble and Crew build a kangaroo safari for Lucas and Lily right in the back yard until their construction kangaroo hops away; Speed Meister challenges Rubble and crew to compete in the ultimate build-off, builder Cove's first construction games.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go
programme.desc: Nia shows Thomas and Diesel how much unique beauty exists in Sodor, which comes in handy when they need plants to beautify a plaza in Vicarstown; when Thomas' whistle suddenly stops working, he learns that he doesn't need his whistle to be himself.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi enters the world of The Wizard of Oz, where she meets familiar vehicle friends and goes on a quest to see the wizard himself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires the Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg; Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: Popcorn accidentally goes to kindergarten with Bernie; Greg is chosen to be the face of Num-Nuggets' new flavor.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rocky visits Rubble and Crew from Adventure Bay just in time to see Builder Cove's new baby bear; when Park Ranger Rose asks for construction help, Speed Meister accidentally ruins the bears' home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George meets Richard Rabbit; Grandpa Pig builds Mr. Scarecrow; even on a windy day, Peppa discovers that leaves can be fun.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa's car runs out of gas, but Granddad Dog's garage is very close.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: George goes on a mission to find out who has stolen a stash of acorns; George becomes curious about the Loch Ness monster when he visits the Man With the Yellow Hat's uncle in Scotland.

programme.title: Barney's World
programme.desc: Barney helps Mel learn how to adopt an optimistic way of thinking to overcome challenges and help an injured fairy.

programme.title: Barney's World (Shorts)
programme.desc: Mel tries to swing across the monkey bars without any help; Barney lets Mel know he's there for her in case she needs him.

programme.title: Toon Bops
programme.desc: TV DJ dances around in space and is joined by Space Girl and Miranda the Panda for a fun dance party.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: When the Mouse Family is exhausted by baby's crying, Vida discovers that she's teething; Vida soothes Tidbit's sunburn when fun in the sun distracts him from reapplying sunscreen.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby and Pandy find a magical jar of googly eyes, they're in for a trouble-making surprise; luckily, MerCat knows just how to burst trouble's bubble.

programme.title: Tea Town Teddy Bears
programme.desc: The Teddy Bears are so busy helping everyone else that they forget to set up for their special holiday party; a masquerade party becomes a friendship rescue mission to reunite best friends Cassia and Marigold.

programme.desc: Ruby and Valerie tidy up the park; Ruby, Louise, and Valerie host a bake sale, while Max flies his dragon kite.
